programme.desc: On the streets of Hong Kong, an arrogant rookie cop and his veteran partner confront a legendary getaway driver, using their cars as weapons in a high stakes showdown.

programme.title: Kung Fu Angels
programme.desc: A spoiled girl is transferred to a new sports school where she meets a handsome kung fu team captain and decides to try wushu. Little does she know that would change her life...

programme.title: Enter The Girl Dragon
programme.desc: Pooja, a big fan of Bruce Lee, practises jeet kune do to become a skilled martial artist. When her boyfriend is kidnapped by the mafia, she must fight back to save him.

programme.title: The Moon Warrior
programme.desc: A benevolent fisherman living a simple life is reluctantly drawn into helping a noble emperor regain his throne from his evil brother.

programme.title: The Most Wanted
programme.desc: A botched police raid leads to a suspected betrayal of an undercover cop. As he is put on the most wanted list by both police and the triad, can he prove his innocence?

programme.title: Skinny Tiger and Fatty Dragon
programme.desc: Detective Baldy and his partner Fatty stumble upon the robbery of a jewelry store, which puts them on the trail of a triad crime syndicate.

programme.title: 3AM The Hospital
programme.desc: A woman in hospital discovers her husbands affair and encounters another victim of the affair. Is this entity a figment of her imagination or a vengeful spirit?

programme.title: VR Fighter
programme.desc: Bodyguard Long Wei becomes a VR fighter with a newly invented armour from a technology firm. When some armed men break into the firm, a fierce battle has just begun...

programme.title: The Hidden Enforcers
programme.desc: A retired police officer trains four assassins to punish wrongdoers who escaped from conviction. However, his good intention turns sour when the assassins kill the cops.

programme.title: Butterfly Lovers
programme.desc: Loosely based on the Butterfly Lovers legend, this is the tragic love story between Zhu Yan Zhi and her martial arts senior, Liang Zhong Shan, in the martial arts world.

programme.title: Tiger Cage
programme.desc: A team of police officers uncovers their seniors involvement in an illegal plot after a drug operation raid. They vow to bring them to justice and root out corruption.

programme.title: Nezha
programme.desc: A former top team racing driver wants to prove himself in a race but accidentally hurts his teammate Lily. A talented virtual car racing champion joins them to regain its glory.

programme.title: Return Of The Lucky Stars
programme.desc: Four orphaned buddies open a detective agency and before they know it, they are coerced into taking on some vicious gangsters...

programme.title: Iron Kung Fu Fist
programme.desc: A skilled martial arts master who left the martial arts world must return to avenge his lovers death with the help of a beggar gang leader.

programme.title: Model Family
programme.desc: Yu Xiang and her daughter move into a new neighbourhood where everyones life seems perfect. However, dark secrets and horror have raided each family from the inside.

programme.title: Lady Reporter
programme.desc: FBI agent Cindy is sent to Hong Kong as an undercover reporter to expose a money forging ring run by a devious newspaper editor, using the newspapers presses.

programme.title: Young Ip Man: Crisis Time
programme.desc: Young Ip Man pursues his studies in Hong Kong in 1917. When the whole school is held hostage during the day of an English speech competition, Ip Man decides to step up...

programme.title: Guns and Roses
programme.desc: Jin Shui risks all to save his family, fleeing France with the help of his friend. Amid challenges, Jin Shui faces a dilemma: love or loyalty to his friend.

programme.title: Young Heroes Of Chaotic Times
programme.desc: Set in Shanghai in the late Qing Dynasty, a young man Chen Zhen, rises to become a national hero after enduring hardships and overcoming challenges in life.

programme.title: Royal Warriors
programme.desc: When a Hong Kong policewoman, a Japanese detective and a security officer foil a plane hijacking attempt, they incur the wrath of the hijackers who are out for vengeance.

programme.title: Bangkok Storm
programme.desc: An underground boxer loses his memory while escaping from the Bangkok triad. When he regains his memory after starting anew, he vows to take down the triad.

programme.title: Wild Search
programme.desc: In a gun trafficking raid, a police officer finds the little girl who witnessed her mothers murder by the ruthless gunrunners, and must protect her from being killed.

programme.title: The Best of Best
programme.desc: Jie has joined SDU and vows to uphold law and justice. As Jie falls in love with the daughter of a triad boss who killed his father, he is torn between love and family...

programme.title: Full Alert
programme.desc: Inspector Pao wants to stop a huge money heist led by an escaped convict Mak Kwan, but ends up engaging in a cat-and-mouse game with him.

programme.title: Warriors Two
programme.desc: Fatty helps his friend Wah to learn martial arts from his Wing Chun master, so that Wah can take down the villains and avenge his mothers death.

programme.title: The Gangster, The Cop, The Devil
programme.desc: Adapted from real events, the story is about a police special team fighting underground criminal organizations with wit and bravery, finally wiping out the enemy.

programme.title: Legacy Of Rage
programme.desc: Brandon Lee, the son of Bruce Lee, stars as Brandon Ma - a man seeking revenge on his friend, Michael, who frames him for his own crime and steals the love of his life.

programme.title: Dragon Tiger Gate
programme.desc: Adapted from a famous Hong Kong comic, three disciples undergo rigorous training to avenge the death of the Dragon Gate Master by defeating the leader of Lousha Clan.

programme.title: Whampoa Blues
programme.desc: Cong and Jin are students of Whampoa Military Training School. They incidentally discover an ammunition smuggling plan and get themselves into danger...

programme.title: Seven Warriors
programme.desc: Set in 1930s Guangxi, a group of villagers threatened by bandits hires seven warriors to stop the bandits tyranny, and team up to defeat the bandits in the end.

programme.title: Blind Detective
programme.desc: A blind former detective, who possesses an uncanny ability to solve cold cases for police reward, teams up with a hit team detective in search of her missing friend.

programme.desc: Welgehawe maak n skokaankondiging. Olivia neem leiding met persoonlikheidstoetse. Fillip word by n magstryd ingesleep, terwyl misverstande volg.

programme.title: Knox Goes Away
programme.desc: Michael Keaton stars and directs this thriller about redemption. A contract killer with dementia is offered a chance to redeem himself by saving the life of his estranged son.

programme.title: Utopia
programme.desc: An exhilarating sci-fi thriller. A soldier who believes his wife has been trafficked infiltrates a facility where he discovers a futuristic fantasy park that blurs reality.

programme.title: Maxxxine
programme.desc: The gruesome third instalment in the X trilogy. Years after surviving a massacre, adult film star Maxine Minx leaps to mainstream fame, but her big break is being threatened.

programme.title: James Acaster: Hecklers Welcome
programme.desc: Comedian James Acaster explores his love-hate relationship with stand-up by relinquishing control of his set and accepting a healthy dose of heckling.

programme.title: Rearview Mirror
programme.desc: A suspenseful thriller. A young mother tries to escape her abusive, controlling husband and start a new life in an idyllic, peaceful beach town.

programme.title: Surprised By Oxford
programme.desc: A compelling faith-based romance based on a memoir by Carolyn Weber. When Caro arrives at Oxford to pursue a PhD, an unexpected friendship opens her to mystery, vulnerability, and love.

programme.title: Corner Office
programme.desc: Academy award-winning director Joachim Back helms this book-inspired workplace dark comedy. An office misfit discovers a secret room that unleashes his true potential.

programme.title: Chickenhare and The Hamster Of Darkness
programme.desc: An epic adventure animation adapted from Chris Grines comic book series. Chickenhare embarks on an adventure to stop his uncle from overthrowing his father, King Peter.

programme.title: Paw Patrol: The Mighty Movie
programme.desc: In this super-powered animation, a magical meteor crash lands in Adventure City and gives the PAW Patrol pups superpowers, transforming them into The Mighty Pups.

programme.title: Bridget Jones: Mad About The Boy
programme.desc: The fourth instalment in the popular romcom franchise. Back in the dating game, single mom and widow Bridget is pursued by a younger man and maybe her sons science teacher.

programme.title: It Ends With Us
programme.desc: Blake Lively leads this compelling, emotional film adaptation of Colleen Hoovers novel. A woman finds herself reliving her childhood trauma when she falls for a charming neurosurgeon.

programme.title: The Wild Robot
programme.desc: A riveting and epic adventure written and directed by Chris Saunders. Voiced by Lupita Nyongo, Roz, a robot stranded on a wild island, must adapt and confront her past to survive.

programme.title: Canary Black
programme.desc: Kate Beckinsale faces a difficult decision in this non-stop action spy thriller. Terrorists blackmail a CIA operative into betraying her own country to save her kidnapped husband.

programme.title: Cleaner
programme.desc: An action-packed hostage thriller. An ex-soldier turned window cleaner is forced into action when a group of radical activists seize an energy companys gala, holding it hostage.

programme.title: The Image Of You
programme.desc: An intriguing psychological thriller based on a book. Anna falls in love with a man, but her twin sister Zoe doesnt trust him and sets out to discover the truth about him.

programme.title: Magic Mike XXL
programme.desc: Channing Tatum returns for a raunchy sequel to the hit film. This time, a down-and-out Mike and his crew travel across the country to participate in a national stripping contest.

programme.title: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again
Force Of Nature: The Dry 2
programme.desc: A captivating, suspenseful sequel to the book-inspired 2020 hit The Dry. Five women go on a hiking retreat, but when one vanishes, Detective Aaron Falk must untangle the mystery.

programme.title: Drive-Away Dolls
programme.desc: A hilarious crime comedy. Two very different friends in search of a fresh start embark on an unexpected road trip. Things go awry when they cross paths with a group of criminals.

programme.title: Mercury Rising
programme.desc: Bruce Willis flexes his action muscle in this fast-paced thriller about an FBI agent who must save a nine-year-old autistic savant who has become the target of assassins.

programme.title: The Fast And The Furious: Tokyo Drift
Theres A Zulu On My Stoep
Dark Asset
programme.desc: A gripping spy action thriller. A soldier becomes part of a secret experimental military program, but when he uncovers its secrets, hes determined to put an end to it.

programme.title: Zone 414
programme.desc: Guy Pearce drives this sci-fi thriller as a private investigator tasked with finding a tech billionaires missing daughter. He teams up with an advanced AI to solve the mystery.

programme.title: Deadly DILF
programme.desc: A compelling thriller. A harmless flirtation between a college girl and the hot dad next door turns deadly when she becomes obsessed with him and tries to destroy his marriage.

programme.desc: Kit Latura, a disgraced emergency services worker, is given his chance at redemption when a New York City commuter tunnel begins to collapse.

programme.title: Get Out
programme.desc: Jordan Peeles opera prima follows an African-American who meets his white girlfriends family and soon learns the sinister reason why he was invited.

programme.title: Paradise City
programme.desc: Ryan Swan must carve his way through the Hawaiian crime world to wreak vengeance on the kingpin who murdered his father.

programme.title: Highlander
programme.desc: The year is 1536 and a Scottish clansman is mortally wounded in battle by a terrifying warrior.

programme.title: Buffaloed
programme.desc: Set in the underworld of debt-collecting and follows the homegrown hustler Peg Dahl, who will do anything to escape Buffalo, NY.

programme.title: Red Heat
programme.desc: A tough, disciplined Russian policeman teams up with an unpredictable, wise-cracking Chicago detective to capture a Russian criminal in the US.

programme.title: Sudden Death
programme.desc: Darren McCord, a fireman with a troubled past, engages in a deadly game of cat-and-mouse with a ruthless adversary when her daughter is taken hostage.

programme.title: Predator
programme.desc: A team of commandos on a mission in a Central American jungle find themselves hunted by an extraterrestrial warrior.

programme.title: Point Break
programme.desc: A gang of bank robbers pulls off their heists while masked as former US presidents. An agent is sent undercover to investigate the group, who are part of the towns surfing culture.

programme.title: Madagascar 3: Europes Most Wanted
programme.desc: A star-studded voice cast, loads of action, superb visuals and plenty of gags ensure the third attempt by the animals to return to NYC is a win.

programme.title: War For The Planet Of The Apes
programme.desc: Caesar and his apes are pitted against an army of humans in an epic battle that will determine the fate of both their species...and the future of the planet.

programme.title: Hulk
programme.desc: Oscar-winning director Ang Lee and Eric Bana bring Marvel Comics most destructive superhero to life in this captivating film that shows the origins of the big green monster.

programme.title: Kick-Ass 2
programme.desc: Its all bigger and fiercer than ever as Kick-Ass and Hit-Girl return for another action-filled romp. This time the stakes are higher as revenge and death are in the air.

programme.title: The Final Destination
programme.desc: Nick OBannons premonition of a deadly car race spares his life and those of a few lucky others around him. But Death wont take no for an answer.

programme.title: All Elite Wrestling Collision
programme.desc: AEWs newest show Collision will deliver more of what fans and viewers tell us they want - athleticism, big personalities, exciting storylines and hard-hitting wrestling action.

programme.title: All Elite Wrestling: Dynamite
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling features a world-class roster of diverse male and female wrestlers, giving fans a new wrestling experience!

programme.title: The Gardener
programme.desc: An immigrant working a quiet life as a gardener at a manor house in England has to rely on old skills to save the family he works for from home invaders.

programme.desc: Die selfgemaakte multi-miljoener Albert van Wyk het sy eerste Miljoen gemaak op die ouderdom van 22. Nou is hy opsoek na die hoërskool entrepreneur wat hy kan mentor om in sy voetspore te stap en die volgende miljoener te word.

programme.title: Gesels
programme.desc: Die week kuier Leandie met Jackie Freed, n vrou met hoop, en Euodia Samson, n ma wat vasklou aan hoop. Stof jou braaitang af, want Herman wys hoe om die perfekte steak met bearnaise-sous te maak.

programme.title: Die Liefde Is n Snaakse Ding
programme.desc: In die bondel vry is uit en liefde is terug - net met n punchline of twee. Mandri en Schalk stuur paartjies wat saam gelag het op n date. Dit raak... morsig. Het hulle die guts om die liefde te kies?

programme.title: Wie weet wat?
programme.desc: Brandon, Janine en Christiaan keer terug om hierdie keer n beter vertoning te lewer. Hulle kry ook die geleentheid om beter te doen wat die geldpotte betref. Wie se strategie gaan die beste werk?

programme.title: Manne Agter Die Potte
programme.desc: By Kapokbos, vernoem na die wilde roosmaryn wat in die Bonnievale-omgewing groei, bied sjef Juan Fourie n plaaslike eetervaring met nostalgiese smake by n uitsonderlike bestemming.

programme.title: Goeiemôre, good morning
programme.desc: Die ontbytprogram sal seker maak Suid-Afrikaners begin hulle dag met al die inligting wat hulle kort. Ons dek alles van nuus en finansies tot leefstyl en vermaak en alles tussenin.

programme.desc: Die spanne 3C Girls en Mamma Mias toets hul musiekkennis oor verskeie kategorieë.

programme.title: Huis SOS
programme.desc: Die voormalige Protea-netbalspeler en TV-aanbieder Vanes-Mari du Toit kry n stylvolle en funksionele kantoorruimte.

programme.title: Veld Tot Fees
programme.desc: Die eindbestemming, Nampo Kaap, is besig! Anlie beweeg van hoek tot kant, met n geselsie hier en lag daar.

programme.title: Hart van die huis met Universal...
programme.sub-title: Hart van die huis met Universal Kitchens. S2/E1
programme.desc: Die einde is nie al van renovasie wat lekker hoef te wees nie. Bok en Hanna pak n reuse-opknappingsprojek lag-lag aan en roep vir Universal Kitchens nader om die hart in hul huis te sit.

programme.title: Goeiemôre, good morning
programme.desc: Die ontbytprogram sal seker maak Suid-Afrikaners begin hulle dag met al die inligting wat hulle kort. Ons dek alles van nuus en finansies tot leefstyl en vermaak en alles tussenin.

programme.title: Dorpie-doenlys
programme.desc: Ons besoek die trotse universiteitsdorpie Potchefstroom. Van ikoniese lanings bome en ryk geskiedenis tot unieke restaurante, blyplekke, besienswaardighede en sportgees soos min - Potch het n karakter wat jou verras!

programme.title: Kom Ons Braai
programme.desc: Ons gunstelingtydverdryf is nou n sosiale eksperiment. Drie spanne wat mekaar goed ken, braai by mekaar en heelwat gebeur om die vuur. En ons praat nie net van die lekker kos nie!

programme.title: Slim Vang Sy Baas: Musiek
programme.desc: Treffer Trio en News 62 toets hul kennis in sewe rondes van musiekvasvrae en ander speletjies. Wie kan prysgeld van tot R10?000 in hul sak steek?

programme.title: Aneeka se kombuis
programme.desc: Aneeka se broers, Imraan en Ashraf, kom kuier vir n sibling-episode vol chaos en childhood favourites. Daars creamy Alfredo, masala steak sandwiches en hope memories.

programme.title: Huis SOS
programme.desc: Die span kuier by die sanger Jo Black, waar n nuwe braaikamer gebou word, leer meer oor verskillende soorte braaihout, proe skaaptjoppies gebraai met kameeldoring, en sit self n gasbraaier aanmekaar.

programme.desc: Tussen Stellenbosch en Brackenfell in die Kaap brand die kompetisievure hoog en die realiteit-ster Karen Schwendtke en aktrise Natasha van der Merwe is daar om te beoordeel.

programme.title: Die Liefde Is n Snaakse Ding
programme.desc: Vergeet van n drafklub of n dating-app, want Schalk en Mandri ken van afsprake opstel. Die week is dit vier nuwe enkellopendes se beurt. Is hulle bereid om alles te waag of sal hulle eerder nog wag?
